data.description: An intensive introduction to the grammar and vocabulary of Classical (Biblical) Hebrew, the language of the Hebrew Bible and Ancient Israel, equivalent toHEBR-BIB 103and104. Gain skills in preparation for reading the Hebrew Bible in the original language. Focus on translation of Hebrew text (written grammar and lexicon). Includes aspects of ancient Israelite culture, history, and literature.
data.title: INTENSIVE ELEMENTARY  BIBLICAL HEBREW

data.description: Introduction to the language of the Hebrew Bible (Biblical Hebrew). Serves as basis for later forms of Classical Hebrew.
data.title: ELEMENTARY BIBLICAL HEBREW, I

data.description: Introduction to the language of the Hebrew Bible (Biblical Hebrew). Serves as basis for later forms of Classical Hebrew.
data.title: ELEMENTARY BIBLICAL HEBREW, II
